properties.title: Bit Repository Collection Settings change notes

release.description: Support for multiple collections in one repository
release.action: Added support for different number of pillars participating in different collections in one repository.
Added mandatory name element to top level
Change definition of CollectionID to a new element containing a list of CollectionIDs.
Switch to using dedicated topics for identifies for pillars, audittrail- and status contributors.
Add configuration option to require checksums for pillar verification.
Add configuration option to require checksums for new files.

release.description: Additions for Status and AuditTrail services
release.action: Removed Audit trail and Alarm levels.

release.description: Additions for Status and AuditTrail services
release.action: Added contributor lists to GetStatusSettings and GetAuditTrailSettings
Removed versioning from name space to confine to message-xml versioning strategy.
Added required element for describing the allowed fileIDs
